title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 113 - Extension Of Time To Report Certain Abandoned Property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 113 - Extension Of Time To Report Certain Abandoned Property

State Regulations
§ 113.1 - Extension of time for reporting abandoned property

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 113

Statutory authority: Abandoned Property Law, §§300, 301, 1412, 1414

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
